timeline.headline: My Artist Timeline
timeline.text: A visual chronological experience of audio

date.headline: Reptilia
date.text:
Reptilia is a song by indie rock band The Strokes, and the second single from their second album Room on Fire.
Length: 214 seconds.

date.headline: Red Hot Chili Peppers
date.text: Red Hot Chili Peppers are an American rock band formed in Los Angeles in 1983.

date.headline: Ferry Corsten
date.text: Ferry Corsten, also known under the alias System F, is a Dutch producer of electronic dance music, in addition to being a DJ and remixer.

date.headline: The Strokes
date.text: The Strokes are an American rock band from New York City, consisting of Julian Casablancas, Nick Valensi, Albert Hammond, Jr., Nikolai Fraiture and Fabrizio Moretti.
